cookingMethod: In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned. Drain off excess fat.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, water, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook the lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the cottage cheese and grated Parmesan cheese.
Preheat oven to 375°F.
Spread a small amount of the meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer with 1/3 of the lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the remaining meat sauce, 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese, and 1/2 of the cottage cheese mixture.
Repeat the layers, ending with the mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.

Meanwhile, cook the lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the cottage cheese and grated Parmesan cheese.

Repeat the layers, ending with the mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.

Spread a small amount of the meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer with 1/3 of the lasagna noodles, 1/3 of the remaining meat sauce, 1/3 of the mozzarella cheese, and 1/2 of the cottage cheese mixture.
Repeat the layers, ending with the mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Allow to cool for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.
In a large skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until browned. Drain off excess fat.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, water, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook the lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain.
